extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void display_menu()
      Main entry point to he menu
      protected static java.lang.String get_input()
      Gets input from the user
      protected static int get_option()
      Gets an option input from the user
      protected static void menu_end()
      Sets exit menu to true to allow menus to exit from their do while loop and return to a previous menu
      protected static void menu_reset()
      Sets the exit menu to false ensuring that when returning from a menu the returning menu is not exited immediately
